alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mason; Menard; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:29PM CDT until April 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Menard County in central Illinois... Northwestern Logan County in central Illinois... South central Tazewell County in central Illinois... Mason County in central Illinois... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 729 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Easton, or 10 miles west of Mason City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Easton around 735 PM CDT. Mason City around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include San Jose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
